m_szDocTitle: 2036; the year you don't have a job & your SMV is based on different parameters : TheRedPill
m_szDocSumamry: 2036; the year you don't have a job & your SMV is based on different parameters : TheRedPill  808182Science2036; the year you don't have a job & your SMV is based on different parameters (self.TheRedPill)submitted 4 months ago * by animalpooAbstract: An anecdotal piece describing the changes that technology is going to have on humans, relating to the job market, political beliefs and determining a man's (Your) SMV/Value in the world come 2036. Intro TRP is focused on what causes these contemporary conditions men find themselves in today. Applying our understanding of human nature and looking b
